document.full_text: u.s. health officials say they have found a far simpler therapy for people at risk of developing tuberculosis, addressing a key barrier to preventing the spread of the disease.
document.title: u.s. study finds easier way to prevent tuberculosis
lines_and_colors: u.s. health officials say they have found a far simpler therapy for people at risk of developing tuberculosis, addressing a key barrier to preventing the spread of the disease.
